list.name: Flock
list.desc: An email based habit tracker built with AWS Lambda, SendGrid, and Flask. I couldn't figure out how to make money with the 400 users, so I stopped paying the Sendgrid bill. I think a few people still track their workouts with it.

list.name: Finn
list.desc: A SlackBot for running polls and raffles. Originally made because picking a place for lunch was too difficult. Before a breaking update from Slack there were over 60 Slack teams and hundreds of users that used Finn.
